ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have brought you the truth and we are certainly truthful men.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet we bring to you the truth, and we are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We truly tell you that we have brought to you the Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have come to you for a genuine purpose and We are true in what we say.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And we have brought to you a true command, and indeed we are truthful.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And we have brought you the truth and certainly we tell the truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And we have come to you with the truth, and we are most surely truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We have come to thee with the truth, and assuredly we speak truly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And bring thee the Truth, and lo! we are truth-tellers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and we have come to you with the truth, and surely we are truthful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And we have brought unto thee the truth, and verily we say sooth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We bring you the truth, and indeed, we speak truly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We have brought to thee that which is inevitably due, and assuredly we tell the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And we have brought to you the truth (the news of the destruction of your nation) and certainly, we tell the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We bring you the truth, and indeed we are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “We bring you the truth, and we are truthful.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:64] And we have brought you the Truth and indeed we speak truthfully, in what we say.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And bring thee the Truth) the news of the torment, (and lo! we are truth tellers) that a chastisement is coming down on them.
